tasks.label: Setup Python Data Analysis Environment
tasks.command: cd project-templates/python-data-analysis && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
tasks.detail: Create virtual environment and install Python dependencies for data analysis project

tasks.label: Start Jupyter for Data Analysis
tasks.command: cd project-templates/python-data-analysis && source venv/bin/activate && jupyter notebook copilot-data-analysis-starter.ipynb
tasks.detail: Launch Jupyter notebook for GitHub Copilot data analysis practice

tasks.label: Generate Sample Data
tasks.command: cd project-templates/python-data-analysis && source venv/bin/activate && cd sample-data && python generate_sample_data.py
tasks.detail: Generate sample datasets for Python data analysis practice

tasks.label: Setup React Todo App
tasks.detail: Install dependencies for React Todo App template

tasks.label: Setup Node.js API
tasks.detail: Install dependencies for Node.js API template

tasks.label: Start Node.js API Dev Server
tasks.detail: Start Node.js development server with hot reload

🎯 Passing Score: 80%

Good luck! 🚀'

tasks.label: Setup React Native App
tasks.command:
echo '
📱 React Native App Template Setup

Navigate to: project-templates/react-native-app/

Follow README.md for setup instructions:
1. Install React Native CLI
2. Install dependencies
3. Set up Android/iOS development environment
4. Run on simulator/device

🚀 Perfect for mobile development practice!'
tasks.detail: Setup React Native mobile app template

tasks.label: Open Progress Tracker
tasks.command:
echo '
📊 GitHub Copilot Certification Progress Tracker

Open: progress-tracker.md

✅ Track your completion progress
📈 Monitor study milestones
🎯 Assess certification readiness
📝 Record insights and notes

💡 Update regularly to stay on track!'
tasks.detail: Open the interactive progress tracking system

tasks.label: Check Study Progress
tasks.command:
echo '
📚 GitHub Copilot Certification Study Progress

✅ Study Materials: 12/12 completed
   • Fundamentals, Prompt Engineering, Advanced Features
   • Responsible AI, Plans & Features, Data Handling
   • Testing, Privacy, Developer Use Cases
   • Emerging Features 2025, Quick Reference & Troubleshooting

✅ Practice Exercises: 5/5 completed
   • Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, Coding Challenges
   • Emerging Features (Spaces, Agent, Extensions, MCP)

✅ Mock Tests: 4/4 completed
   • Practice Test 1, 2, 3, and Emerging Features

✅ Project Templates: 4/4 completed
   • React Todo App, Python Data Analysis
   • Node.js API, React Native Mobile App

✅ Additional Resources:
   • Progress Tracker, Code Examples

🎯 Comprehensive preparation complete with 2025 updates!
🚀 You are ready for the certification exam!'

tasks.label: Practice Emerging Features
tasks.command:
echo '
🚀 GitHub Copilot Emerging Features Practice Guide

📁 New Study Materials:
   • 10-emerging-features-2025.md - Latest Copilot capabilities
   • emerging-features-exercises.md - 12 hands-on exercises

🎯 Key Features to Master:
   • Copilot Spaces - Collaborative AI workspaces
   • Coding Agent - Autonomous development tasks
   • Extensions - Third-party tool integrations
   • MCP Servers - External data connections
   • Custom Instructions - Personalized guidance
   • Multi-Model Workflows - Optimal AI selection

📝 Practice Test 4 - Emerging Features (25 questions)

💡 Start with the study guide, then practice exercises!'
tasks.detail: Guide for practicing with GitHub Copilot's newest features

tasks.label: Open Study Schedule
tasks.command:
echo '
📅 2-Week GitHub Copilot Certification Study Schedule

Week 1:
• Day 1-2: Fundamentals & Prompt Engineering
• Day 3-4: Advanced Features & Responsible AI
• Day 5-6: Plans, Data Handling & Privacy
• Day 7: Review & Practice Test 1

Week 2:
• Day 1-2: Testing & Developer Use Cases
• Day 3-4: Hands-on Projects & Coding Challenges
• Day 5-6: Advanced Exercises & Practice Test 2
• Day 7: Final Review & Exam Preparation

🎯 Stick to the schedule for optimal preparation!'
